sentences.english: Their first exhibition of themselves was in a processional march of two and two round the parish.
sentences.chinese: 他們最初的表演是排成雙行隊伍繞着教區遊行。

sentences.english: He was wedded already to his books and his parish .
sentences.chinese: 他早已同他的書本和教區結了不解之緣。

sentences.english: A flock of white ibis stands in marsh grass on Dry Bread Island in St. Bernard Parish, Louisiana on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 阿白䴉羊羣中的乾麪包草洲溼地站在聖伯納德教區。

sentences.english: The members of this parish have got used to it," said Father Pierangelo Motta.
sentences.chinese: 現在這個教區的教徒們都已經習慣使用它了。

sentences.english: The parish sang to the rafters songs of praise to a God that apparently surrendered His voice to ours.
sentences.chinese: 這個教區唱的歌曲是讚美上帝的聲音圍繞着我們。

sentences.english: He became a rector of a small parish where he ministered for several years.
sentences.chinese: 他成爲一個小教區的教區長，在那裏主事了幾年聖事。

sentences.english: He became a rector of a small parish where he ministered for several years.
sentences.chinese: 他成爲一個小教區的教區長，在那裏主事了幾年聖事。

sentences.english: The members of this parish have got used to it, " said Father Pierangelo Motta."
sentences.chinese: 現在這個教區的教徒們都已經習慣使用它了。

sentences.english: She was in high favor at the episcopal palace of Arras.
sentences.chinese: 她在阿拉斯主教教區裏很受人尊敬。

sentences.english: I'll now call at the vicarage and report to you in due course.
sentences.chinese: 我現在要去教區牧師家拜訪，然後適時向你彙報情況。

sentences.english: Clearly, the bishop was privy to parish records.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，主教對教區的記錄很清楚。

sentences.english: The little girl had come upon the parish ever since her parents died.
sentences.chinese: 小姑娘父母雙亡後，就一直靠教區的接濟生活。

sentences.english: Phil told me there was a new tornado in our area.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾告訴我新一輪龍捲風襲擊我們的教區。

sentences.english: The vicar gave an excellent sermon.
sentences.chinese: 教區牧師的佈道非常精彩。

sentences.english: Me and Joseph Cardinal Zen Ze-kiun (The Prelate and Bishop of Hong Kong. ) at the unveiling of the portrait ceremony .
sentences.chinese: 羅卓睿與香港教區主教陳日君樞機在典禮合照。

sentences.english: The two people put up the banns of marriage in their respective parishes.
sentences.chinese: 倆人在各自的教區裏張貼了結婚預告。

definition: to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
to wield (political etc) power/be in power
